nwn-lib-d tools

nwn-lib-d tools are a set of command-line tools for manipulating Neverwinter Nights 2 files (and some NWN1 files). They are multi-platform (usable on Windows or GNU/Linux) and do not require the game to be installed.

The tools can be downloaded on the Github release page.
More information on the tools can be found in the project's readme.

nwn-gff

Serialize / deserialize GFF files (bic, utc, jrl, ...).

nwn-tlk

Serialize TLK files to readable text.

nwn-erf

Create, extract or view ERF files (hak, erf, mod).

nwn-trn

TRN/TRX terrain, water, walkmesh import/export and prototype area baking tool

nwn-srv

Send requests to NWN2 servers (ping, player count, etc.)

nwn-bdb

View/search Bioware/foxpro database content (dbf + ctx + fpt).
